languages.text: "Потрошитель Иллиридоса, Сжигатель Баркагского царства и убийца Карроция Бледного... Иллиридосом назывался мир, населенный нашими дальними родичами-эльдарами — до того, как туда с жатвой явился мой рейд. Баркагское царство было отдельным кластером на границе Комморры до того, как вступило в войну с Опустошительной бурей. Я оставил его по колено залитым кровью его обитателей".

traits.locale_text: "Благодаря тебе?" {n}Маражай позволяет себе тонко улыбнуться.{/n} "Ты выш{mf|ел|ла} живой из схватки только потому, что я был на твоей стороне. Твое заблуждение удручающе глубоко".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale... Illiridos was a world inhabited by our distant Aeldari cousins — until I led a reaping raid there. The Barkhag Kingdom was a separate cluster on the fringes of Commorragh before it went to war with the Reaving Tempest. And by the time I left, I was wading through the blood of its inhabitants."
languages.original_text: "Потрошитель Иллиридоса, Сжигатель Баркагского царства и убийца Карроция Бледного... Иллиридосом назывался мир, населенный нашими дальними родичами-эльдарами — до того, как туда с жатвой явился мой рейд. Баркагское царство было отдельным кластером на границе Комморры до того, как вступило в войну с Опустошительной бурей. Я оставил его по колено залитым кровью его обитателей".

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Eviscerador de Illiridos, Llama del Reino de Barkhag Kingdom y Asesino de Carrocius el Pálido... Illiridos era un mundo habitado por nuestros primos Aeldari... hasta que lideré una incursión para cosecharlo. El Reino de Barkhag era un cúmulo solitario en los confines de Commorragh que decidió marchar a la guerra contra la Tempestad Asoladora. Para cuando me fui, tenía que vadear la sangre de sus habitantes».
languages.original_text: "Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale... Illiridos was a world inhabited by our distant Aeldari cousins — until I led a reaping raid there. The Barkhag Kingdom was a separate cluster on the fringes of Commorragh before it went to war with the Reaving Tempest. And by the time I left, I was wading through the blood of its inhabitants."

traits.locale_text: «Eviscerador de Illiridos, Llama del Reino de Barkhag Kingdom y Asesino de Carrocius el Pálido... Illiridos era un mundo habitado por nuestros primos Aeldari... hasta que lideré una incursión para cosecharlo. El Reino de Barkhag era un cúmulo solitario en los confines de Commorragh que decidió marchar a la guerra contra la Tempestad Asoladora. Para cuando me fui, tenía que vadear la sangre de sus habitantes».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “伊利里多斯的开膛剑，嚎巫王国的烈焰，卡洛西斯的屠宰者……伊利里多斯是我们灵族远亲居住的世界，后来我率领收割队袭击了那个地方。嚎巫王国是科摩罗边缘地带的独立星群，后来它与狂风阴谋团开战了。当我离开那个王国的时候，它淹没在了王国居民的血海之中。”
languages.original_text: "Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale... Illiridos was a world inhabited by our distant Aeldari cousins — until I led a reaping raid there. The Barkhag Kingdom was a separate cluster on the fringes of Commorragh before it went to war with the Reaving Tempest. And by the time I left, I was wading through the blood of its inhabitants."

traits.locale_text: “伊利里多斯的开膛剑，嚎巫王国的烈焰，卡洛西斯的屠宰者……伊利里多斯是我们灵族远亲居住的世界，后来我率领收割队袭击了那个地方。嚎巫王国是科摩罗边缘地带的独立星群，后来它与狂风阴谋团开战了。当我离开那个王国的时候，它淹没在了王国居民的血海之中。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「イリリドスのエヴィサレイター、バルカグ王国の炎、白きカロシウスの殺し屋…イリリドスは、俺がその襲撃を指揮するまでは、遠い親戚であるアエルダリが住んでいた惑星だった。バルカグ王国は、略奪の嵐との戦争に突入する前は、コモラフの周縁にある別個の集団だった。そして俺が去った時には、住民の血の海になり果てていた」
languages.original_text: "Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale... Illiridos was a world inhabited by our distant Aeldari cousins — until I led a reaping raid there. The Barkhag Kingdom was a separate cluster on the fringes of Commorragh before it went to war with the Reaving Tempest. And by the time I left, I was wading through the blood of its inhabitants."

traits.locale_text: 「イリリドスのエヴィサレイター、バルカグ王国の炎、白きカロシウスの殺し屋…イリリドスは、俺がその襲撃を指揮するまでは、遠い親戚であるアエルダリが住んでいた惑星だった。バルカグ王国は、略奪の嵐との戦争に突入する前は、コモラフの周縁にある別個の集団だった。そして俺が去った時には、住民の血の海になり果てていた」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « On me connaît également comme l'Éventreur d'Illiridos, le Brasier du royaume de Barkhag et le Tueur de Carrocius le Blafard... Le monde d'Illiridos était habité par nos lointains cousins aeldaris, jusqu'au jour où j'y ai mené un raid sanglant. Avant d'entrer en guerre avec la Tempête ravageuse, le royaume de Barkhag était une colonie isolée en périphérie de Commorragh, et quand j'en suis reparti, je pataugeais dans le sang de ses habitants. »
languages.original_text: "Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale... Illiridos was a world inhabited by our distant Aeldari cousins — until I led a reaping raid there. The Barkhag Kingdom was a separate cluster on the fringes of Commorragh before it went to war with the Reaving Tempest. And by the time I left, I was wading through the blood of its inhabitants."

traits.locale_text: « On me connaît également comme l'Éventreur d'Illiridos, le Brasier du royaume de Barkhag et le Tueur de Carrocius le Blafard... Le monde d'Illiridos était habité par nos lointains cousins aeldaris, jusqu'au jour où j'y ai mené un raid sanglant. Avant d'entrer en guerre avec la Tempête ravageuse, le royaume de Barkhag était une colonie isolée en périphérie de Commorragh, et quand j'en suis reparti, je pataugeais dans le sang de ses habitants. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Eviscerator von Illiridos, Lohe des Barkhag-Königreichs und Sieger über Carrocius den Blassen ... Illiridos war eine Welt, die von unseren entfernten Aeldari-Vettern bewohnt wurde ... bis ich einen Ernteangriff dort anführte. Das Barkhag-Königreich war ein separater Cluster am Rande von Commorragh, bevor es in den Krieg gegen den plündernden Sturm zog. Und als ich ging, watete ich durch das Blut seiner Bewohner."
languages.original_text: "Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale... Illiridos was a world inhabited by our distant Aeldari cousins — until I led a reaping raid there. The Barkhag Kingdom was a separate cluster on the fringes of Commorragh before it went to war with the Reaving Tempest. And by the time I left, I was wading through the blood of its inhabitants."

traits.locale_text: "Eviscerator von Illiridos, Lohe des Barkhag-Königreichs und Sieger über Carrocius den Blassen ... Illiridos war eine Welt, die von unseren entfernten Aeldari-Vettern bewohnt wurde ... bis ich einen Ernteangriff dort anführte. Das Barkhag-Königreich war ein separater Cluster am Rande von Commorragh, bevor es in den Krieg gegen den plündernden Sturm zog. Und als ich ging, watete ich durch das Blut seiner Bewohner."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale... Illiridos was a world inhabited by our distant Aeldari cousins — until I led a reaping raid there. The Barkhag Kingdom was a separate cluster on the fringes of Commorragh before it went to war with the Reaving Tempest. And by the time I left, I was wading through the blood of its inhabitants."

languages.text: "İlliridos'un Karındeşeni, Barkhag Krallığı'nın Alazı, Kansız Carrocious'ın Katili... İlliridos, uzak Aeldari soydaşlarımızın yaşadığı bir dünyaydı. Sonraları baskınlarımdan birinde kıyıma uğradı. Barkhag Krallığı, Müfteris Kasırga'ya savaş açmadan evvel Commorragh sınırlarındaki ayrı bir kümeydi. Oradan ayrılma vaktim geldiğinde sakinlerinin kanları içinden yüzerek geçmem gerekti."
languages.original_text: "Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale... Illiridos was a world inhabited by our distant Aeldari cousins — until I led a reaping raid there. The Barkhag Kingdom was a separate cluster on the fringes of Commorragh before it went to war with the Reaving Tempest. And by the time I left, I was wading through the blood of its inhabitants."

traits.locale_text: "İlliridos'un Karındeşeni, Barkhag Krallığı'nın Alazı, Kansız Carrocious'ın Katili... İlliridos, uzak Aeldari soydaşlarımızın yaşadığı bir dünyaydı, sonra baskınlarımdan birine uğradı. Barkhag Krallığı, Müfteris Kasırga'ya savaş açmadan evvel Commorragh sınırlarındaki ayrı bir kümeydi. Oradan ayrılırken sakinlerinin kanları içinden yüzmek zorunda kaldım."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
